author: ab
msg: NUTCH-921 Reduce dependency of Nutch on config files.

author: stsp
msg: Follow-up to r1079758: Oops, committed the wrong diff :(
* subversion/libsvn_client/info.c
(build_info_for_entry): Add curly braces around nested if statements.

author: stsp
msg: Fix for issue #3792. Make svn info to display information for excluded items.
* subversion/include/private/svn_wc_private.h,
subversion/libsvn_wc/node.c
(svn_wc__node_depth_is_exclude): New helper function to find out
whether the node is set to depth 'exclude'.
* subversion/libsvn_client/info.c
(build_info_for_entry): Process node with depth 'exclude' like a normal one.
* subversion/svn/info-cmd.c
(print_info): Print depth as 'exclude' for nodes having depth exclude.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/depth_tests.py
(info_excluded): Remove XFail marker.
Patch by: Noorul Islam K M <noorul{_AT_}collab.net>
(minimal tweaks to log message by me)

author: gtully
msg: give test plenty of time before failing

author: julianfoad
msg: * subversion/tests/cmdline/svntest/main.py
(run_command, run_command_stdin, run_svn): Update doc strings to mention
that if EXPECTER_ERROR is None then any stderr output will
raise an exception.
